entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 21 January 2023
